Trumpovi se selijo iz New Yorka na Florido
01 Nov 2019, 16:45 by STA

Ameriški predsednik Donald Trump je v četrtek priznal, da je septembra skupaj s prvo damo Melanio Trump preselil svoje stalno bivališče iz New Yorka v Palm Beach na Floridi. Zagotovil je, da ima mesto, ki mu je plačal milijone davkov, rad, da pa se je odločil za odhod zaradi odnosa tamkajšnjih politikov do njega.



Donald in Melania Trump Foto: Profimedia

WASHINGTON > Donald Trump je tvitnil, da bo naslednjih pet let verjetno še v Beli hiši v Washingtonu kot predsednik ZDA, nato pa se bo z družino preselil na Florido v svoj klub Mar-a-Lago. Newyorški guverner Andrew Cuomo je hitro tvitnil: “Hvala bogu. Tako ali tako tukaj ni plačeval nobenih davkov. Florida, imej ga,” je tvitnil demokrat.
Trump je v New Yorku odrasel, zgradil Trumpovo stolpnico, šestkrat razglasil stečaj, zaradi česar mu skupaj z naravo nepremičninskega posla ni bilo potrebno plačevati davkov, davčne napovedi pa še vedno skriva. Čeprav ga v mestu, še posebej na Manhattnu, ne marajo in mu niti v času republikanskih strankarskih volitev niso namenili največ glasov, je Trump utelešenje New Yorka.
Palm Beach sicer ne bo velika sprememba, saj zaradi ugodnega podnebja in številnih zdravstvenih ustanov velja za pribežališče bogatih Newyorčanov na stara leta.
Trumpovi utemeljitvi, da se seli iz New Yorka na Florido zaradi grdega obnašanja newyorških politikov sicer nihče zares ne verjame. Ameriški mediji, ki se sklicujejo na vire blizu predsednika poročajo, da gre v prvi vrsti za selitev zaradi davkov. V New Yorku so visoki, na Floridi precej nižji.
Florida nima državnega davka na dohodek, prav tako nima davka na dedovanje, zaradi česar je pravi raj za bogate. Koliko bo dejansko prihranil z davki, sicer ni moč ugotoviti, ker Trump uspešno skriva svoje davčne napovedi ter se s svojo armado odvetnikov upira vsem poskusom, da bi kdo prišel do številk.
Selitev je verjetno tudi politična, saj se Trump zaveda, da v državi New York na volitvah prihodnje leto ne bo premagal demokratskega protikandidata, na Floridi, ki jo mora skoraj nujno osvojiti, pa ima veliko boljše možnosti.
text:
Trump's are moving from New York to Florida
01 Nov 2019, 15:45 by STA

US President Donald Trump on Thursday acknowledged that he and his first lady Melania Trump moved their permanent residence from New York to Palm Beach, Florida, in September. He assured that he liked the city, which paid him millions of taxes, but that he decided to leave because of the attitude of politicians there.



Donald and Melania Trump Photo: Profimedia

WASHINGTON> Donald Trump tweeted that he will probably be at the White House in Washington as president of the United States for the next five years, and then move with his family to Florida to his Mar-a-Lago club. New York Governor Andrew Cuomo tweeted quickly: “Thank God. Anyway, he didn't pay any taxes here. Florida, have it, ”the Democrat tweeted.
Trump grew up in New York, built a Trump tower, declared bankruptcy six times, which, along with the nature of the real estate business, did not require him to pay taxes, but he still hides his tax returns. Although he is not liked in the city, especially in Manhattan, and has not received the most votes during Republican party elections, Trump is the embodiment of New York.
Palm Beach is not going to be a big change, because of its favorable climate and many health facilities, it is considered a haven for wealthy New Yorkers for years to come.
No one really believes Trump's argument that he is moving from New York to Florida because of the nasty behavior of New York politicians. US media citing sources close to the president report that it is primarily tax-related migration. They are high in New York, much lower in Florida.
Florida has no state income tax, nor does it have an inheritance tax, making it a true haven for the rich. How much he will actually save on taxes is unclear as Trump successfully hides his tax returns and with his army of attorneys resists any attempt to reach anyone.
The move is also likely to be political, as Trump is aware that he will not defeat a Democratic candidate in New York State next year, and he has a much better chance of winning in Florida, which he must almost necessarily win.
